Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: We need to produce a structured representation of high-level activities, with justification. Use the sample log to infer grouping rules. Provide names like Material Preparation, Assembly (Welding), Quality Inspection, etc.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: We should output maybe JSON or table. Provide rationale for each grouping.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Also mention that we used temporal proximity, resource type, logical sequence.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Let's craft answer: list high-level steps: 1. Material Handling & Preparation 2. Welding Assembly 3. Coating Application & Drying 4. Final Inspection

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Explain each group: events included and why.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Also propose mapping from low-level events to high-level step per case.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Provide structured representation maybe as array of objects with stepName, includedActivities, justification.
